Posts.Content: lady_pak wrote: Hi everyone, my mother has been diaganosed with IDC on 18th septmeber, she had her surgery and after her biopsy report, it says she has IDC, 5.1 cm tumor, Grade 3, ER 80-90% +ve /PR 50-60% +ve and Her2nue 2+(waiting for FISH result). Also it says very annoying thing. i.e.: "1 out of 18 lymp nodes +ve for metastatic carcinoma with extra capsular spread". (this is annoying me) like is the cancer type metastatic? what is it? does this effect cancer stage? Someone told me its Stage 3A... is it ok? Kindly guide me as i am too worried about her. Thanks. Dx 9/18/2012, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 9/27/2012 Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 10/31/2012 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Targeted Therapy 12/11/2012 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Hormonal Therapy 3/16/2013 Radiation Therapy 3/17/2013 Breast Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My mother diagnosed with Breast cancer lady_pak itsjustme10

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2012 08:35AM lady_pak wrote: Thank you, i will surely read these guide lines. any further help will be much appriciated by anyone.
